nodes.documentation:
@dev It takes at least 2 minExitPeriod for each new vault contract to start.
     This is to protect deposit transactions already in mempool,
     and also make sure user only needs to SE within first week when invalid vault is registered.
     see: https://github.com/omisego/plasma-contracts/issues/412
          https://github.com/omisego/plasma-contracts/issues/173

@notice interface to get the 'maintainer' address.
@dev see discussion here: https://git.io/Je8is

constructor.details: It takes at least 2 minExitPeriod for each new vault contract to start.     This is to protect deposit transactions already in mempool,     and also make sure user only needs to SE within first week when invalid vault is registered.     see: https://github.com/omisego/plasma-contracts/issues/412          https://github.com/omisego/plasma-contracts/issues/173

registerVault(uint256,address).details: emits VaultRegistered event to notify clients

params._vaultId: The ID for the vault contract to register

registerVault(uint256,address).notice: Register a vault within the PlasmaFramework. Only a maintainer can make the call.

vaultToId(address).notice: Public getter for retrieving vault ID with vault address

vaults(uint256).notice: Public getter for retrieving vault address with vault ID
